title: Runtime Metadata
description: Uploaded metadata of a brood runtime

filename.description: The original filename of the runtime.

build_system_version.description: The version of the build system used to produce the runtime (e.g. enicab version).

upstream_version.description: The actual upstream version number of the runtime (if it is not compatible with the brood version specification).  This is used for informational purposes only.

version.description: The version number of the runtime.

file_format.description: The file format of the runtime.

build.description: The build number of the runtime.

sha256.description: The SHA256 hash of the runtime file.
